questions.question: In a chess tournament, five friends—Alice, Bob, Carol, Dave, and Eve—compete. Alice cannot play against Carol. Who does Dave play against?
Which two elements make up more than 99% of the Earth's crust by mass?
Which of the following words is an anagram of 'resilient'?
What is the measure of one interior angle in a regular hexagon?
You have two hourglasses, one measuring 7 minutes and the other measuring 11 minutes. How can you measure exactly 15 minutes using only these two hourglasses?
options: A) Start both hourglasses at the same time.
B) Start the 11-minute hourglass and flip it when it runs out.
C) Start the 7-minute hourglass and flip it when it runs out.
questions.answer: B) Start the 11-minute hourglass and flip it when it runs out.

questions.question: Which subatomic particle is responsible for chemical reactions and bonding?
In a deck of playing cards, if a card is not a spade, then it is red. What is the color of the Ace of Hearts?
What is the value of π (pi) to three decimal places?
Who is the author of the philosophical work 'Meditations'?
